lead_paragraph: ANDERSON--Jeanne. The community of West End Synagogue, A Reconstructionist Congregation, has lost a courageous role model. Determined, she remained active and relevant, totally committed to social and racial justice. Fittingly, she took her last breath on Martin Luther King, Jr. Day. Our sympathies to all her children. 1/3
